action.name: Artillery Strike
entries: Select a point between 100ft and 1000ft away.
Roll a {@dice D8} to determine the direction the shot will stray using the table below.
The shot will stray {@dice 1d8} times 5 feet in that direction.
The shot creates a fireball in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on the impact
point. Each creature in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make
a Dexterity saving throw. A target takes {@damage 8d6} fire damage on a failed save, or
half as much damage on a successful one. The fire spreads around corners. It
ignites flammable objects in the area that arenâ€™t being worn or carried.
